Package eu.fbk.dkm.springles.backend

Backend adapters.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Backend
    Backend abstraction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBackendTransaction  
    AbstractRepositoryBackend
    Abstract backend implementation wrapping a Repository instance.
    AbstractSailBackend
    Abstract backend implementation wrapping a Sail instance.
    Backends
    Static factory and utility methods operating on Backends.
    DebuggingBackend
    A Backend decorator that logs method calls and checks they respect the Backend API and lifecycle.
    ForwardingBackend
    Implementation of Backend that forwards by default all method calls to a delegate Backend.
    RepositoryTransaction  
    SailTransaction
